page.title: 08A large agricultural farm 2
page.content: Lorries take it to the sugar_beet factory for it to be refined. The end product of sugar_beet is sugar. Its other use is cattle feed called beet pulp. A sugar_beet is round long and pointed. We plant potatoes from april onwards by both hand and machine. We use a fertilizer to help them grow. We would need to irregate in a dry summer with high preasure pumps. When ready for gathering, the potatoes have more than one potato on each root. We harvest the potatoes from September onwards. They are kept in potato stores, which are insulated and well ventilated and then gased later to stop them from chitting (which means to stop them having shoots). The potatoes are sold for chips, crisps, smash and household eating.
